Text: Magic Attic Club SpecialsApst Greetings once again from the Magic Attic Club We have another very special offer for you our valued internet patron Our irresistably adorable Magic Attic Club baby doll plus our hip Magic Attic Club Garden Girlfriends bead kit Together regularly sold for now reduced to only until June th Call our customer service representatives today Offer includes Item Garden Girlfriends bead kit and one of the following Item Baby Caucasion doll or Item Baby AfricanAmerican doll or Item Baby Hispanic doll Limited to stock on hand while supplies last Thank you for your continued patronage Keep an eye out for our next emailed special Further transmissions to you by the sender of this email may be stopped at no cost to you by sending a reply to this email address with the word remove in the subject line MaySpecialsdoc
